column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We had chorizo wrapped dates (how could we not)
column5: and the grilled octopus. All was so delicious
column6: but the standouts were the carpaccio
column8: and the mushrooms. The wagyu was so smooth and buttery and paired really well with the cheese that came with
column9: and the mushrooms were so flavorful and cooked to perfection.
